doc:
Sam Polo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Polo 0 Sam Polo (November 7, 1872 – October 3, 1966) was an American make up artist and actor of the silent movies era known for The Lion's Claws (1918), The Great Circus Mystery (1925) and A Man from Nowhere (1920). He was the brother of Eddie Polo. He died in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California, and is buried at Inglewood Park Cemetery, Los Angeles, California. Sam_Polo ( November_7_,_1872 – October_3_,_1966 ) was an_American make up artist_and_actor of the_silent_movies_era known for The_Lion 's_Claws ( 1918 ) , The_Great_Circus_Mystery ( 1925 ) and A_Man from Nowhere ( 1920 ) . He was the_brother of Eddie_Polo . He died in Woodland_Hills , Los_Angeles , California , and is_buried at Inglewood_Park_Cemetery , Los_Angeles , California .
